title: Creating a New Tenant
text: To initiate the creation of a new Tenant, simply click on the "NEW TENANT" button. This action will direct you to a dedicated page where you can input the required information. The necessary details consist of: Business Name*: Enter the desired name for the business you are establishing. Currency*: Select the currency that will be used by this business. Expires In*: Pick a timeframe from the provided drop-down menu to determine the desired duration for which this Tenant should remain active. In case you decide to cancel the creation of a New Tenant at any stage, simply click on the "CANCEL" button. A confirmation prompt will appear asking you to confirm the cancellation. Once confirmed, you will be redirected back to the main Tenants page. After providing the Tenant Details, the subsequent step involves adding users, who will be the staff members utilizing the portal. Please keep the following important points in mind: It is mandatory to add at least one user before you can proceed with the form. You can include multiple users within a single Tenant. ADDING A USER To include a user, commence by clicking on the "+" button. This action will display a form where you must fill in the following fields: When adding a user, ensure that you provide the following information: Username: Assign a unique name to the user for access. Be aware that if you attempt to use a username that already exists, a warning message will be displayed. Email: Enter the user's email address. First Name: Specify the user's first name. Last Name: Specify the user's last name. Language/Region: Choose the desired language from the provided drop-down menu. Module Count: Determine the modules that will be accessible to the user in the portal. After entering the necessary details, click on the save icon. To assign modules to the user, follow these steps: Click on the Module field, triggering the appearance of a drop-down menu containing the available modules. Select the relevant modules by highlighting them. Click on "UPDATE" to save your changes. Upon successfully saving your modifications, a notification will confirm that the changes have been implemented. Once you have completed the creation of the new Tenant and the addition of Users, proceed by clicking on the "CREATE" button. A prompt will appear, asking you to confirm the action. Click on the confirmation button to proceed for the third time, and the system will initiate the processing of the Tenant. It's crucial to keep in mind that if you fail to click the "CONFIRM" button within a few moments, the system will revert back to the "CREATE" button. In such a case, you will need to restart the process. Once the Tenant has been successfully added, a notification will be displayed to confirm the action, and you will be redirected back to the main page.

To initiate the creation of a new Tenant, simply click on the "NEW TENANT" button. This action will direct you to a dedicated page where you can input the required information. The necessary details consist of:

  • Business Name*: Enter the desired name for the business you are establishing.
  • Currency*: Select the currency that will be used by this business.
  • Expires In*: Pick a timeframe from the provided drop-down menu to determine the desired duration for which this Tenant should remain active.



In case you decide to cancel the creation of a New Tenant at any stage, simply click on the "CANCEL" button. A confirmation prompt will appear asking you to confirm the cancellation. Once confirmed, you will be redirected back to the main Tenants page.


After providing the Tenant Details, the subsequent step involves adding users, who will be the staff members utilizing the portal. Please keep the following important points in mind:


It is mandatory to add at least one user before you can proceed with the form.

You can include multiple users within a single Tenant.


ADDING A USER

To include a user, commence by clicking on the "+" button. This action will display a form where you must fill in the following fields:



When adding a user, ensure that you provide the following information:

  • Username: Assign a unique name to the user for access. Be aware that if you attempt to use a username that already exists, a warning message will be displayed.
  • Email: Enter the user's email address.
  • First Name: Specify the user's first name.
  • Last Name: Specify the user's last name.
  • Language/Region: Choose the desired language from the provided drop-down menu.
  • Module Count: Determine the modules that will be accessible to the user in the portal.
  • After entering the necessary details, click on the save icon. To assign modules to the user, follow these steps:


Click on the Module field, triggering the appearance of a drop-down menu containing the available modules.

Select the relevant modules by highlighting them.

Click on "UPDATE" to save your changes.

Upon successfully saving your modifications, a notification will confirm that the changes have been implemented.





Once you have completed the creation of the new Tenant and the addition of Users, proceed by clicking on the "CREATE" button. A prompt will appear, asking you to confirm the action. Click on the confirmation button to proceed for the third time, and the system will initiate the processing of the Tenant.


It's crucial to keep in mind that if you fail to click the "CONFIRM" button within a few moments, the system will revert back to the "CREATE" button. In such a case, you will need to restart the process.


Once the Tenant has been successfully added, a notification will be displayed to confirm the action, and you will be redirected back to the main page.
